articles.author: Jamie Carter
articles.title: In Photos: A Full ‘Cold Moon’ Occults Mars On A Rare And Auspicious Night For Crewed Spaceflight - Forbes
articles.description: A full Moon blotted-out Mars at its biggest, brightest and best for up to an hour as seen from North America, Europe and North Africa on the 50th anniversary of the launch of Apollo 17, NASA’s final crewed mission to land humans on the lunar surface.
articles.content:
Children play to the backdrop of the full moon, known as the Cold Moon as it rises, on December 07, ... [+] 2022 in Portland, England. (Photo by Finnbarr Webster/Getty Images)
Getty Images

articles.title: Watch: US-Russia Prisoner Swap On Airport Tarmac, Basketball Star Freed - NDTV
articles.description: American basketball star Brittney Griner was headed back to the United States on Thursday after being released from a Russian prison in exchange for an arms dealer known as the "Merchant of Death."
articles.content:
President Joe Biden announced Griner's release early Thursday.

articles.author: Press Association
articles.title: US trades basketballer Brittney Griner for Russian arms dealer in prisoner swap - BreakingNews.ie
articles.description: The deal, the second such exchange in eight months with Russia, procured the release of the most prominent American detained abroad.

articles.title: How the current Southwestern North American megadrought is affecting Earth's upper atmosphere - Space Daily
articles.description:
Urbana IL (SPX) Dec 08, 2022 -
